Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-4693 affecting package grub2 for versions less than 2.06-13
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-4693 affecting package grub2 for versions less than 2.06-13. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package grub2 is earlier than 2.06-13, affected by CVE-2023-4693
